text: Byrom Eaton, (1613-1703)D.D. was an English priest in the late 17th and early 18th centuries.CCEd Eaton was born in Grappenhall and educated at Brasenose College, Oxford. He was Principal of Gloucester Hall from 1662 and 1692;University of Leicester and Rector of Nuneham Courtney from 1660. He was Archdeacon of Stow from 3 March 1677 until his resignation in 1683; and Archdeacon of Leicester from 1683 until his death. == Notes == Category:1703 deaths Category:Alumni of Brasenose College, Oxford Category:People from Cheshire Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:Archdeacons of Stow Category:17th-century English Anglican priests Category:18th-century English Anglican priests Category:1613 births Category:Principals of Gloucester Hall, Oxford
title: Byrom Eaton
